author: danbarto
body:
#### PR description:

The sum of the unclustered energy is one of the inputs to MET significance, but is currently not stored in miniAOD, making recomputation of the significance and the MET covariance matrix difficult. With this PR, the calculated sum of the pTs of the unclustered particles is stored, and can be accessed with metSumPt(), similar to metSignificance().
This makes a later calculation, e.g. in nanoAOD as proposed in [this PR](https://github.com/cms-nanoAOD/cmssw/pull/443), redundant.

#### PR validation:

All tests have been run, and were passed.
title: Keeping sumPt from MET Significance calculation
